RTCPeerConnectionPendingLocalDescription.summary:
The read-only property
RTCPeerConnection.pendingLocalDescription returns an
object describing a pending configuration change
for the local end of the connection. This does not describe the connection as it
currently stands, but as it may exist in the near future. Use
or
to get the current state of the
endpoint. For details on the difference, see
Pending and current descriptions in the WebRTC Connectivity page.
RTCPeerConnectionPendingLocalDescription.value:
If a local description change is in progress, this is an
describing the proposed configuration. Otherwise,
this returns null.
